long NutIrGet (u_long tmo)

Function Documentation

long NutIrGet (  u_long  tmo  ) 
 

Get next infrared code.

Parameters:
tmo Timeout in milliseconds.
Returns:
The code received from an infrared decoder or -1 on timeout.
